title: grouping documentation is incorrect in 3.x
description:
The grouping example in package.html doesn't look like it works for 3.x,
because it has stuff like TopGroups<BytesRef> groupsResult (but in 3.x
the method returns TopGroups<String>). 

So i think it needs to be updated for 3.x

comments.content: Yes, that is incorrect. Nice catch! Too bad I never noticed this!
comments.author: Martijn van Groningen

comments.content: Attached patch with fixes in documentation.
comments.author: Martijn van Groningen
